nodes.text: Mandal Hypernautics was a division of the Mandalorian starship manufacturer MandalMotors that was responsible for producing the StarViper-class attack platform.

In the new Star Wars canon, Mandal Hypernautics was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2006 video game expansion Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption.
